title: Looking for three people Aged 16-20 to play normal's and ranked with.
body:
Preferably some New Zealander's so the time is the same, I play with my friend Oscar most of the time but we need a proper team to play with. We are both Bronze IV this season so far but last season we were silver V but went down to Bronze I before the season ended. 

We are both pretty versatile and don't mind playing any roll. I am especially good at ADC and Top, Oscar is also a good Top and Jungle.

We are in Auckland so if you are also in Auckland that would make our skype calls better.

Thanks, John

replies.body:
HI. I am a silver 3 adc main. would happily join you

add me in game: lachiesummer

Hello :) I am currently silver 3. I main adc. I was gold 2 last season but i've moved from mid to adc to learn the role. Since about 3 days ago i've started actually winning again! I'm already in a ranked team that I play on tuesdays (plat/gold mostly)- but i would like very much to play adc (or mid if i must) in another ranked team to just get more experience. Last season i went from B5 to G2 in 3000 ranked games and this season S5 to S3 in about 200. PLayed about 60-70 ranked 5's games since last season. Please add me in game :) IGN: BurstFire301 im 16 btw- live in WA but used to live in NZ

Hey, I'm S2 atm and i main adc
IGN - ZeroZephyr
Oce server? I main mid but can play any role
Yes, We play on the oce server. We play after school almost everyday and on Sundays. Having someone main mid would be cool but if you want to try the other rolls we can help you.
